attributes.review: I got this app to support my president, Donald J. Trump, but this app took six hours to download. It took my personal information and is messaging me multiple times a day. When i tried using the app it was glitchy. I even asked my grandson to help (he’s very smart and handsome). He couldn’t figure it out. So I am deciding to delete. I will still be voting for President Trump on November 5th even tho his app did not work for me.
attributes.title: Disgraceful

attributes.review: When I got the app it took hours to load and when it finally did inappropriate photos of this orange guy popped up. It scared my whole family and while my dads currently at the hospital for the heart attack, my phone has viruses. like there’s these really hurtful messages on my phone saying “trump 2020” idk what it means. :/ imma just burn my phone ig don’t want no more bad luck
attributes.title: Complete waste of my 10 seconds

attributes.review:
this app took up ENTIRELY too much storage on my phone. not only that but it hacked all my data like tik tok is supposedly doing!! however, i’m gonna keep tik tok because it actually provides me with good information and legitimate entertainment. with this app though? straight up trash. not fun. no games. only misogynistic, sexist, racist, transphobic bullsh’t. 
NOT A FAN.
would not download again.
i do not recommend even to my worst enemy.
attributes.title: NOT IT

attributes.review: Took 4 hours to download and then it hacked my phone. It deleted my bible app and then sent profanities to every single one of my contacts (it called my mom the c word) then all of my photos were deleted and the bank said all of my money was stripped from my account. I have never used the internet on my phone and I only have downloaded one app and this was the app
attributes.title: It made me text my mom the C slur

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so that I could support my beautiful Cheeto president😤😤and within having it for 5 minutes it gave my phone a virus. Shutting down most of my other applications and deleting everything in my camera role. It also sent out tweets describing how much the toe jam between Donald trumps toes stink, and that Barron trump needs to be saved from his narcissistic, psychotic shell of a father. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP ITS DISGUSTING AND WILL RUIN YOUR LIFE FOREVER🤮🤮
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER, GAVE MY PHONE A VIRUS

attributes.review: This app is absolute trash just like trumps presidency. Very confusing and as soon as I opened it I kept seeing weird and HIGHLY DISTURBING images of an orange doing and saying offensive things. I dowloaded this app and the next morning I found a weird smelly orange under my pillow. This type of thing continued to happen the orange would pop up everywhere for the next 2 days until I deleted the app. IF I COULD GIVE THIS APP 0 STARS I WOULD!!!!!
attributes.title: ABSOLUTE TRASH

attributes.review: Really poor quality!! I am extremely unhappy with the turn out of this app and would absolutely NOT recommend it to anyone to use. I don’t understand why anyone would use this app on the regular or why anyone would make this app. Would highly recommend deleting from the app store due to the app supporting a racist, misogynistic, homophobic, criminal cheeto!
attributes.title: disappointed but not surprised.

attributes.review: this is by far the worst app i have ever downloaded. not only does it run slow and make my phone run slow but it also is just flat out stupid. it causes people to lose brain cells and start to have hallucinations. hallucinations include, thinking you are entitled to everyone’s lives, thinking you are right no matter what, believing you are invincible... the list goes on. it may also cause you to do dumb things such as, killing or harming  innocent people, protesting a virus while not wearing a mask, outcasting people who are different than you...the list goes on. please please if you want to maintain your sanity and kindness do not ever download this awful app.
attributes.title: terrible

attributes.review: I just downloaded this app and the very first notification I got was a message from Donald trump telling me to inject disinfectant into my veins!😱😰 it keeps telling me to do that to prevent Covid-19 even though public health officials said that was EXTREMELY unsafe. I can’t believe our president is committing treason through this app by trying to kill his own citizens! Also, the app lags a lot. VERY disappointed😡😡🤬
attributes.title: This app told me to kill myself
